detail_desc: Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a grosgrain trim at the top, elastic strap over the foot and decorative bow at the front. Fabric linings and insoles.

Gently fitted, padded jacket with a stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a lined, padded, hood with a faux fur trim. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, diagonal, zipped pockets, and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Small, sturdy handbag in imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top and a detachable metal chain shoulder strap. One inner compartment. Lined. Size 9x13x17.5 cm.
Paper straw hat with a band.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in a crinkled weave with a round neckline, opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, and short raglan sleeves with a flounced trim. Seam at the waist and a gathered seam further down with a flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a rounded hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Chino shorts in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with low ribbing at the waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Long-sleeved wrapover blouse in woven fabric with a shawl collar, concealed press-studs down the front and slits in the sides. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt.
Long skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short underskirt.
Pull-on trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets. Tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and hem, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Triangle bikini top with wide shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts. Cut-out sections at the sides, a wide elastic hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Cable-knit dress in a soft cotton blend containing some wool. Round neckline with a button at the back of the neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Top in soft viscose jersey with short, flounced sleeves, a V-neck with buttons at the top and a straight-cut hem.
Cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, fake front pockets and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fabric cap with a motif. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Cropped top in a cotton knit with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and scalloped hem.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with an all-over print. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
Tunic in soft, airy denim made from Tencel™ lyocell with a V-neck with ties at the top. Embroidered yoke and 3/4-length sleeves with embroidered trims.
Sandals in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the ankle. Imitation leather insoles and patterned soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow ties at the sides and a gathered seam at the back.
Soft, non-wired lace bras in cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide light support. No fasteners.
Platform sandals in imitation suede with an elasticated ankle strap and braided jute trims around the heels and soles. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 10 cm.
Metal chain belt with a small, detachable purse in imitation leather. Belt with an adjustable carabiner hook fastening. Purse with a flap and press-stud. Size of purse 9x12 cm.
Padded gilet with a stand-up collar and fastening down the front. Lined.
Nightdresses in soft, printed cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves and a small bow at the neckline.
Running cap in woven fabric with a soft terry sweatband inside and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bodysuit and leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a frill-trimmed neckline and long sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist and frill trim at the back.
Top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Tube scarf in a soft knit with a wrapover front. Length approx. 34 cm, circumference approx. 55 cm.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.

Long dress in a crinkled weave. Narrow cut at the top, a small frill trim around the neckline and an opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the hem for added volume. Lined. The polyester content of the outer fabric of the dress is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. High collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short, fitted dress in a crinkled weave with a concealed zip at the back and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with a small frill trim and decorative tie belt, and pleats front and back. Unlined.

Rain jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable, pile-lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap front pockets with a press-stud and elastication at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Pile lining.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a decorative metal buckle at the front and elastic with a metal fastener at the back.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, chest pocket with a decorative button, and straight hem with slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, print motif and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt dress in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, button placket and decorative tie detail at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, side pockets and a bell-shaped skirt.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.
Wide shorts in woven fabric with a sheen, high waist and creases. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a boat neck and gathers at the sides for best fit.
Blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen and a concealed button placket. Round neckline and long sleeves that taper to a buttoned cuff.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Trousers in an airy, slub-weave Tencel™ lyocell and linen blend. High waist, pleats at the top and a fly with a chunky zip and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a flap and button, a low crotch and wide, straight-cut legs.
Top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with a text motif in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Set with two ear cuffs and two non-matching earrings in metal in various designs. The zinc content is recycled.

Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and a button at the back of the neck. Opening at the front with inset lace, open back with lace panels, a gathered seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt with concealed zip at the back. Lined.

Straight-cut coat in a felted wool blend with notch lapels and buttons and diagonal welt pockets at the front. Unlined. The wool content of the coat is recycled and the polyester content is partly recycled.
Metal bangle.
Double-layered hat in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front. (normal sequins in sizes 1½-3Y).
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Straight-cut blouse in a viscose weave with a lace yoke at the top and scalloped trim around the neckline. Short, flounced sleeves with inset lace trims.
Hooded jacket in fleece with a 3D pattern. Zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Straight-style shirt in soft pima cotton piqué with a gently tapered waist, button-down collar, French front and open chest pocket. Double-layered yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey with a text print on the front, decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a bodysuit, pair of leggings and hat in printed organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with ear appliqués at the top.
Short dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Short cap sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, sturdy denim. Slim fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets, and thumbholes at the cuffs.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Short, straight-cut dress in a cotton weave with a concealed zip at the back and short, pleated sleeves. Unlined.
Sun hats in cotton twill. Lined.

Shirt in a cotton and cupro weave with a turn-down collar and classic front in a straight style with a gently tapered waist. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. The cupro content of the shirt is recycled.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
